title: Definitions
context: ยง446-1 Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Debt adjuster&rdquo; means a person who for a profit engages in the business of acting as an intermediary between a debtor and the debtor&rsquo;s creditors for the purpose of settling, compromising, or in any way altering the terms of payment of any debts of the debtor and who: [(1)] Receives money, property, or other thing of value from the debtor, or on behalf of the debtor, for distribution among the creditors of the debtor; or [(2)] Otherwise arranges for payment to, or distribution among, the creditors of the debtor. &ldquo;Debtor&rdquo; means an individual and includes two or more individuals who are jointly and severally or jointly or severally indebted. &ldquo;Nonprofit organization&rdquo; means a corporation or association, no part of the net earnings of which may inure to the benefit of any private shareholder or individual. &ldquo;Person&rdquo; means an individual, partnership, corporation, firm, association, or any other legal entity. [L 1967, c 3, ยง2; HRS ยง446-1; gen ch 1985] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged.
